channel.title: Hugo on Technuflections
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Technuflections

item.title: Blogging with hugo
item.description: Background Hugo is a static website generator, in the same vein as Jekyll or Hexo. A website can be understood as : a server with the usual concerns (routing, authentication, content delivery, etc.) hosted content (html, js, css, etc.) A static website generator has, as its mission, the generation of the hosted content from other content. Hence it can be specified by f, a function so that, given a content c, returns the hosted content constituting the target website : f(c) = h.
